name: Skuntank

passive.name: Stench
passive.effect: Enemy Benched Pokemon can remain Poisoned, but only take Damage while Active. If an effect would remove Poison from an Active Pokemon, it may target a Benched Pokemon instead.

attacks.name: Spray
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. It costs 1 less for it to retreat during your opponent's next turn.

flavor: For inexperienced trainers trying to raise a Skuntank, tomato juice is a must.
